column4: hey guys whats a good book that i can buy that details all the commandline commands available in ubuntu and debian so that i can learn to control a ubuntu install without the gui
'ls /*bin /usr/*bin ' for the list and 'man command ' for the info.
ogg is a compression format for sound files, replaces mp3.  you can convert cda to ogg.  i do it with audacity all the time.  and there are other apps that use ogg as well.
